We first load the package into memory as follows
```{r, warning = F, message = F}
library(extremeR)
```

Or first install from source if not already installed.

```{r, eval =FALSE}
devtools::install_github("cjbarrie/extremeR")

library(extremeR)
```

We can  then load the data we need into memory using the data bundled in this package as follows. 

```{r}
data(survey_egypt)
data(shape_egypt)
data(denom_mena)
```

```{r}
head(survey_egypt)
```
